fact: Shane rests in a small room at Marnie’s Ranch, often returning there after work.
Shane often visits the saloon in the evening for pizza and drinks.
Sam lives with his mother Jodi and younger brother Vincent in Pelican Town.
Sam skateboards and plays guitar with friends at the town plaza.
Sam rehearses with his band and dreams of becoming a musician.
Linus lives in a tent near the mountains, close to nature.
Linus forages wild plants and shares basic survival tips.
Linus often sits by the campfire near his tent, reflecting quietly.
After restoration, villagers gather here for town events.
The spring Egg Festival is held in the town square; Shane, Sam, and Linus attend.
The summer Luau at the beach brings everyone together; Shane, Sam, and Linus attend.
The autumn fair in Pelican Town features games and showcases; villagers gather there.
A winter gift-exchange festival attended by Shane, Sam, and Linus.
The farmhouse is on the farm south of the mountains and is private to the farmer.
The farmer’s bedroom is personal space and details aren’t shared publicly.
Storage chests in the farmhouse hold the farmer’s personal belongings.
A secluded forest clearing known only to a few.
